statements: SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM PatientVitalSigns ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure, temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY blood_pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns ORDER BY patient_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM HealthStatus;
SELECT patient_id, status, last_checked FROM HealthStatus WHERE status='good';
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature, blood_pressure FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE temperature < 98.6;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitalSigns ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%normal%';
SELECT p.patient_id, h.status, p.heart_rate FROM PatientVitalSigns p JOIN HealthStatus h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM PatientVitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM PatientVitalSigns;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Monitor' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vitals ORDER BY patient_id DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100;
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, vitals.heart_rate FROM patients JOIN vitals ON patients.patient_id = vitals.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%hospital%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, devices.device_name FROM patients JOIN devices ON patients.patient_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM patient_records WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(oxygen_level) AS min_oxygen_level FROM health_status;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_records WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure < 120;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM device_info ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age >= 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, temperature, oxygen_level FROM health_status WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND oxygen_level > 95;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT p.name, d.name AS doctor_name, h.name AS hospital_name FROM Patients p JOIN PatientDoctores pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON pd.doctor_id = d.doctor_id JOIN Hospitals h ON d.specialty = h.name;

SELECT p.name, v.temperature, v.heart_rate FROM Patients p JOIN VitalSigns v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.temperature > 98 AND v.heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY v.temperature DESC, v.heart_rate DESC;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM Patients p JOIN PatientDoctores pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING appointment_count > 2 ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
